page.title: 14NEW LONGTON A separate place
page.content: NEW LONGTON is a completely different village from Longton. A newer community was built round the railway station in the last 100 years. There are three general shops converted from houses, and a block of modern shops. The Church was built in 1960 and consecrated in 1964. There is a new village hall in the process of being built. { The New Longton Cricket Club}plays in the Chorley and District League and is well supported, running two teams each season. They also run a football team for the boys of the village. { The Bowling Club}is also a popular meeting place for New Longtoners since there is a bar inside the club house for refreshment to be taken in case of inclement weather. The Club is exclusive except on Fridays when ladies are allowed.
